Index.title: Fullstack MERN Developer Mid-Senior
Index.name: Name: {name}
Index.profile1: Fullstack Web Developer with over 5 years of experience programming for various IT companies. I specialize in working with the MERN stack to create beautiful, real-time websites and engaging user experiences.
Index.profile2: I have strong backend skills, including building servers, middlewares, routes, and APIs using Node.js and Express.js. When it comes to persisting user data, I typically work with NoSQL databases, particularly MongoDB Atlas Cloud environments.
Index.profile3: My native language is Spanish, but I am also fluent in English. I have extensive experience working remotely with U.S.-based clients, regularly conducting meetings in English over extended periods. As a highly motivated and organized individual, I thrive in fast-paced, collaborative team environments.
Index.profile5: Currently, I am advancing in the field of Artificial Intelligence, focusing on designing AI agents that accelerate web development and enable more natural and efficient interactions between users and their data.
Index.profile4: I am seeking the next big challenge in my career, whether it involves remote work or relocating abroad. I am open to opportunities that allow me to continue growing and expanding my programming skills.
